description:
Azusa B. McLaren is a Single Undine working in http://anidb.net/ch125951 [Himeya Company]. Like her senior http://anidb.net/ch8498 [Aika], she is brave, direct and self-confident. She doesn`t look before she leaps when it comes to something that interests her. She notes any important information in her electronic organizer. She practices with http://anidb.net/ch75709 [Anya] from http://anidb.net/ch125950 [Orange Planet].
Source: ANN
name: Azusa B. McLaren
